## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change fixing an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change adding functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature causing existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code quality improvement (refactoring, tests, linting)

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the code style of this project (linting passes)
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or my feature works
- [ ] All tests pass locally (`npm run test`)
- [ ] I have updated documentation as needed (README, CHANGELOG)
- [ ] I have added an entry to CHANGELOG.md under "Unreleased"
